name: Md Rajib Khan
review: This is not the aluminum chassis I expected but a super machine overall.

name: Rakib Hasan
review: I just bought this laptop and the first thing I noticed booting it up was that the screen was just awful. Washed out, too dark, and too bright all at the same time.

name: John Helmi
review: Bought this laptop to do minor office tasks and was surprised by how efficient it is. Can even play some games on it (at medium graphics). Definitely one of the best purchases.

name: Zessika Zebin
review: Bought this as a gift for my hubby for Christmas. So far he loves it. Fairly easy to setup. Remains to be seen how long it lasts.

name: Tania Islam
review: Great light weight and compact great for my schooling.
